name: The SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PHILADELPHIA, Petitioner v. DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION, Respondent
name_abbreviation: School District v. Department of Education

parties: The SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PHILADELPHIA, Petitioner v. DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of April 2011, the single justice order dated March 25, 2011, temporarily staying this matter, is VACATED, and the School District’s Emergency Application for Stay or Supersedeas Pending Action on Petition for Review is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
17 A.3d 918
The SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PHILADELPHIA, Petitioner v. DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 7, 2011.
